article_title: Wal-Mart Returning To Full-Time Workers-Obamacare Not Such A Job Killer After All?

article_metadata.description: (Image credit: Getty Images via @daylife) Wal-Mart, the nation’s largest employer, announced Monday that 35,000 part-time employees will soon be moved to full-time status, entitling them to the full healthcare benefits that were scheduled to be denied them as a result of Wal-Mart's efforts to avoid the requirements of Obamacare. While some [...]
article_metadata.author: Rick Ungar
